episodes.title: Sun Myung Moon: They Called Him A Cult Leader… He Claimed To Be The Messiah
episodes.description:
"The world saw a cult leader. I was just following orders—from Heaven."
In this final reflection, told from the perspective of Reverend Sun Myung Moon himself, we dive into the life of one of the most controversial religious figures of the 20th century. From claims of receiving a divine mission from Jesus Christ at age 16, to building a global religious and political empire—this is not just a retelling of events. It's a confession.

What does it mean to be called the messiah by your followers—and a fraud by the rest of the world?
What happens when a man believes he was chosen to finish what Jesus started?

This isn’t a documentary. It’s a reckoning.
The story of Reverend Moon—as he might have told it before the end.

🔔 Subscribe for more powerful stories and life lessons: https://www.youtube.com/@BehindTheStoryWithTG?sub_confirmation=1
👍 Like | 💬 Comment | 🔗 Share to inspire others
